brief_summary.textblock:
This study's primary objective is to assess the effects of environmental lead exposures and
      genetic risk factors on the development of osteoporosis in middle-aged women.

clinical_study.brief_title: Lead Exposure, Genetics, and Osteoporosis Epidemiology

criteria.textblock:
Healthy participants in the Nurses' Health Study who live in the greater Boston
        metropolitan area.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Defined Population, Time Perspective: Longitudinal
